content:
I forgot to add comments to my code.

Is it better to resubmit my pset late but with comments, or to leave it without comments but on time?
subject: Resubmit pset late with comments or leave it without comments but on time?

content: You'll lose 1 "late day" but if you submit the next PSET on or before the 2nd day after its due date at 9pm, it won't matter. I say resubmit it with the comments.

Thank you for your advice!

I've resubmitted it with comments.
